code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[city,setCity]=useState("");const[weather,setWeather]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState("");const getWeather=()=>{fetch("/api/weather/".concat(city)).then(res=>{if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Ciudad no encontrada");return res.json();}).then(data=>{setWeather(data);setError("");}).catch(err=>{setError(err.message);setWeather(null);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{background:"#dff4ff",minHeight:"100vh",textAlign:"center",padding:"40px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83C\uDF24\uFE0F WeatherNow"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Introduce una ciudad (Madrid, Sevilla...)",value:city,onChange:e=>setCity(e.target.value),style:{padding:"10px",width:"300px",borderRadius:"8px",border:"1px solid #ccc"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:getWeather,style:{marginLeft:"10px",padding:"10px 15px",borderRadius:"8px",border:"none",background:"#007bff",color:"#fff"},children:"Buscar"}),weather&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:"40px",fontSize:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:weather.city}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Temperatura: ",weather.temp," \xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Condici\xF3n: ",weather.condition]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Viento: ",weather.windspeed," km/h"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Lat/Lon: ",weather.lat,", ",weather.lon]})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"red",marginTop:"20px"},children:error})]});}export default App;
